main event: A bright light was observed traveling towards the observer, appearing to turn and oscillate, before emitting a white flash and disappearing.
interesting points: The object was tracked by SPADATS and Vandenburg AFB, but no missile activity that could have been responsible was detected.
The observer was on a commercial flight at 33,000 feet when the sighting occurred.
A similar sighting had been reported by another aircraft in the same general area within the previous six weeks.
An informal conversation revealed that a crew member on a separate flight had also observed an unidentified object in the same general area a day earlier.
The sighting lasted for only a few seconds, ending in a sudden white flash and disappearance of the object.
